description_html: Petiole Wall Leaves will not leave you disappointed. These leaves are crafted from artisan-grade resin making them lightweight for the wall and are hand finished in silver leaf for a glamorous effect. The exquisite detailing and dramatic scale of the Petiole Leaves will give you that wow factor you have been missing. Available in 4 styles and 2 sizes, including a 160 inch colossal.
